verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}As morning dawns and evening fades You inspire songs of praise That rise from earth to touch Your heart And glorify Your Name{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Your Name is a strong and mighty tower Your Name is a shelter like no other Your Name let the nations sing it louder ‘Cause nothing has the power to save but Your Name{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, in Your Name we pray Come and fill our hearts today Lord, give us strength to live for You And glorify Your Name{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Your Name is a strong and mighty tower Your Name is a shelter like no other Your Name let the nations sing it louder ‘Cause nothing has the power to save (2x) but Your Name{/lang-eng}
